General.Name: Bionet
General.Description: BIONET Corp. provides cord blood banking services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers stem cell banking services, including stem cell storage, mesenchymal stem cell storage, dental stem cell storage, adipose stem cell, and PBSC + immune cells; and genetic testing services. It also provides stem anti-aging and ANIKINE series products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
